title: 89/385/EEC: Commission Decision of 10 May 1989 authorizing the French Republic to apply intra-community surveillance to imports of meat of sheep or goats originating in New Zealand (only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 10 May 1989
authorizing the French Republic to apply intra-community surveillance to imports of meat of sheep or goats originating in New Zealand
(Only the French text is authentic)
(89/385/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The French Republic is hereby authorized to apply intra-Community surveillance in accordance with Decision 87/433/EEC until 31 December 1989 to imports of meat of sheep and goats, fresh, chilled or frozen, falling within CN code 0204, originating in New Zealand.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 May 1989.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
